Prompt: Generate an image of the process where potassium permanganate granules fall into water and dissolve.

World_Knowledge.text: A deep pink to purple solution

Checklist: The image accurately depicts the deep purple or magenta color characteristic of potassium permanganate.
The image shows visible streaks or swirls of color diffusing through the water, representing the dissolving process rather than a uniform liquid.
The solution exhibits a gradient of intensity, appearing darker and denser near the bottom or source of the granules, consistent with the reference.
